Uses of Class
model.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    clui
    This package contains the command-line user interface.
    controller
    This package contains various controllers, which are strategies to select the next move for a given player.
    model
    this package contains all of the data structures used to model the state of the five-in-a-row game, and for processing the rules of the game.
